Package edu.ntnu.idatt1002.model

Class ExcelExporter

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idatt1002.model.ExcelExporter
public class ExcelExporter extends Object
A class that exports a csv file to excel.
Version:
1.2 - 26.04.2023
Author:
Emil J., Vegard J., Sander S. and Elias T.
